## 📊 Course Delivery Method

learnings.details:
"

---

## 📊 Course Delivery Method

**Academy LMS Integration:**
- Video lessons with downloadable transcripts
- Interactive exercises and worksheets
- Embedded AI tool (Module 3)
- Progress tracking and completion certificates
- Mobile-responsive design
- Downloadable resources library

**Estimated Time Investment:**
- Core content: 3-4 hours
- Tool practice: 2-3 hours
- Template exploration: 1-2 hours
- **Total value delivery: 6-9 hours + lifetime tool access**

---

## 💰 Pricing Strategy

**Launch Pricing:**
- **Early Bird**: $197 (limited time)
- **Standard**: $397
- **VIP Edition**: $697 (includes 1-on-1 implementation call)

**Payment Options:**
- One-time payment
- 3-month payment plan available
- 30-day money-back guarantee

---

*This course structure need to be implemented in Academy LMS with StoreEngine integration
